meanings.definition: A sequence of rulers from the same family or group.
meanings.sent1: The history book talked about the dynasties that ruled the ancient kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The Ming and Qing dynasties were powerful in Chinese history.
meanings.sent3: The dynasties in the story were always fighting over who got to sit on the throne.
meanings.sent4: In the business world, the dynasties of successful entrepreneurs inspire others to strive for greatness.
meanings.sent5: The dynasties of talented artists left a lasting legacy in the art world.

meanings.definition: A period during which a particular family or group holds power.
meanings.sent1: During the dynasties of the pharaohs, Egypt flourished.
meanings.sent2: The dynasties of the Middle Ages shaped the course of European history.
meanings.sent3: In the land of make-believe, the dynasties of fairies and elves ruled the enchanted forest.
meanings.sent4: The dynasties of technology giants like Apple and Microsoft have revolutionized the way we live.
meanings.sent5: The dynasties of brave knights and noble kings were the stuff of legends.
